data.title: Bloomfield, CT
data.meta_description: The land records for the Town of Bloomfield are administered and maintained by the Town Clerk.
data.text:
Online Land Record Search

The land records for the Town of Bloomfield are administered and maintained by the Town Clerk. The land records are official documents relating to real estate property, including deeds, easements, mortgages, liens, maps, and other related documents.

Recording (& Copy) Fees for Land Record documents:

First page (non-map): $60

Each subsequent page: $5

Conveyance surcharge: $2

Missing grantee address surcharge: $5

Missing typed/printed witness name surcharge: $1

Generic map: $20

Subdivision map (3 or more lots): $30

Copies of documents: $1 (per page)

Document copy certification: $2

Property Transfer Considerations
